ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Van Allen Probe B DC-coupled sensor potentials and negative of spacecraft potential relative to sensor floating potentials from RBSP-EFW.
ResourceHeader.Description: DC-coupled sensor potentials and negative of spacecraft potential relative to sensor floating potentials from RBSP-EFW.

InformationURL.Name: EFW home page at the University of Minnesota
InformationURL.Description: Daily Summary Plots and additional L2 data

InformationURL.Name: Van Allen Probes Science Gateway
InformationURL.Description: Science Gateway (including Mission Rules of the Road for Data Usage)

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: NASA Space Physics Data Facility (SPDF) CDAWeb.
NASA Space Physics Data Facility (SPDF) CDAWeb.

Parameter.Name: Time, UTC
Parameter.Caveats: Time tags for the survey quantities

Parameter.Name: EFW Sensor Voltages, V1..V6.
Parameter.Caveats: EFW Sensor voltages relative to spacecraft ground.

Parameter.Name: Average potential from opposing booms
Parameter.Description: ---> Average potential from opposing booms (fixed scale -15 to 5 V)

Parameter.Name: Configuration (HSK) timetags, UTC
Parameter.Caveats: Configuration timetags. Used for BEB and DFB config values..

Parameter.Name: EFW BEB Configuration
Parameter.Description: EFW Boom Electronics Board (BEB) configuration code (sensor biases)
Parameter.Caveats: Indicates the configuration of the EFW Boom Electronics Board (BEB). Encodes the following information: for each sensor, sensor current bias, usher and guard voltage bias. See TBD_URL for details of mapping between code value and instrument configuration (not crucial for L2 data interpretation).

Parameter.Name: EFW DFB Configuration
Parameter.Description: ---> EFW Digital Fields Board (DFB) configuration code (on-board spectral and waveform processing configuration)
Parameter.Caveats: Indicates the configuration of the EFW Digital Filter Board (DFB). Encodes the following information: assignment of analog input channels to the various on-board spectral processors (FBK, SPEC, XSPEC); parameters of the on-board B-field-aligned data processing; nominal or contingency multiplexer programming. See TBD URL for detailed mapping from code value to instrument configuration (not crucial for L2 data interpretation).

Parameter.Name: Time, UTC
Parameter.Caveats: The elements of efw_qual are determined on a fixed cadence regardless of the nominal cadence of the individual L2 data products, and epoch_qual provides storage for those fixed-cadence time tags..

Parameter.Name: EFW Data Quality Flags
Parameter.Description: ---> EFW quality array (global estimate of EFW data quality, plus 13 underlying observatory and instrument-level data quality factors)

Parameter.Name: EFW Quality Flags Components
Parameter.Description: Component numbers for EFW data quality flags, efw_qual.
